name: OBCIDIO
overview:
OBCIDIO combines enterprise social software, business networking and project management tools allowing professionals to seamlessly interact with both their internal and external business connections on an open network.

Plug into your companies own private social community to collaborate in real-time with coworkers or step outside company walls to forge new relationships, share human resources and uncover new opportunities.

As OBCIDIOâ€™s open model still provides all the benefits and security of traditional enterprise social software, it takes collaboration to the next level by removing barriers that have inhibited the ability to interact with professionals outside company walls.

  • Manage communication, files, contacts, to-dos, and events from your own private cloud
  • Plug into your companies own private social community to collaborate with coworkers
  • Seamlessly interact with customers, vendors, partner companies and other professionals
  • Forge new relationships outside company walls to discover new opportunities
  • Mange projects, tasks and milestones from remote locations with mobile access
